name: Commercial Partners
tag_list: commercial, realestate, brokerage, san-francisco, investment, fund, capital
overview:
Commercial Partners is a full service independent commercial real estate brokerage firm with expertise in all aspects of real estate transactions - locally, regionally, nationally and internationally.

The scopes of our services include:

â€¢ Office Property Leasing Tenant Representation
Landlord Representation â€¢ Investment Sales â€¢ Industrial Property Leasing â€¢ Retail Property Leasing

The Commercial Partners team is comprised of a select group of seasoned professionals. Each of the senior partners has over 20 years of commercial real estate experience, having represented in excess of 10 million square feet of transactions collectively. Many of our clients are in multiple markets and as a result we have represented clients locally, nationally, even internationally.

The partners chose to start their new venture because of a common belief that they could provide a significantly higher level of personal service working as a team. Using this collaborative approach to each transaction which includes sharing ideas, experiences and each person’s expertise ensures that the best service will be provided to our clients.

Commercial Partners also offers their employees, partners, even our own clients the ability to participate in our real estate investment fund. Getting the insider’s perspective creates a unique opportunity to our clients.
